subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{liushu|p}}. An enclosure ({{l|zh|囗}}) with a hand-restricting instrument ({{l|zh|㚔}}) — prison.

In many oracle bone engravements, there was a form composed of {{l|zh|囗}} + {{l|zh|執}}; it additionally depicted a kneeling human who is confined with the forementioned instrument.
